cui_name: Anatomic Stage IV Breast Cancer AJCC v8
reasoning: Stage IV (metastatic) breast cancer represents approximately 5-8% of incident breast cancer cases. Global breast cancer incidence ~65 per 100k; anatomic stage IV represents ~5.2 per 100k based on AJCC v8 staging criteria.
source: Bray F et al. (2018). Global cancer statistics 2018: GLOBOCAN estimates of incidence and mortality worldwide for 36 cancers in 185 countries. CA Cancer J Clin. 68(6):394-424
